subject: Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Attn: Beneficiary.
Have you been Scammed before if YES please contact us for more investigation.
You have been dictated by our monitoring system for making fraudulent
and illegal transactions over internet with so many impostors. You are
now instructed to stop every further correspondence with the
person(s), failure to do so will lead to further jeopardy with the
release of your approved lottery inheritance compensation funds.
Therefore, 
we advice that you send to us every emails you receive from
them regarding your pending payment, to enable us confirm it's
authentication and guide you accordingly to facilitate your payment.
Contact Email: 
pauljanius@gmail.com
Contact phone number: +1 (219) 243 2242
Contact Name: Paul Janus
Your urgent feed back is needed within 48hours to help our
verification team authenticate and validate your payment for immediate
release to you without any breach of the law.
You are advised to reconfirm the below information for proper
verification and validation of your payment claims document to
facilitate the immediate release of your funds.
Your Full Names:
Current Address:
Direct Phone Number:
Occupation:
Date of Birth:
I'D Card
:
Anticipating your urgent response today.
Yours faithfully.
FBI Agent, Paul Janus .
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION
UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE
WASHINGTON, D.C. 20535

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Hello FBI Agent Paul Janus,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern and the information you have provided. I haven't been scammed before, but it's good to know that there are monitoring systems in place to protect people from fraudulent activities.

Could you please provide more details about the specific fraudulent activities that were detected? I want to make sure I understand the situation clearly so that I can cooperate fully with your instructions.

Also, could you explain how sharing emails received from potential scammers will help validate my payment claims? I want to ensure that I follow the correct procedures and provide any necessary information to facilitate the release of my funds.

Regarding the reconfirmation of my ID card, could you clarify why it is needed and how it will be used in the process?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jennifer

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Please Reconfirm The Following Information For Your Delivery.

(1) Your name........... (2) Your phone number............. (3) Your
complete address............. (4) Nearest airport to your
address............. (5) Your Occupation................

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out. I'd be happy to help you with the information you need. Could you please provide me with more details about what exactly you are looking for?

Best wishes,
Jennifer

subject: Re: Attn: Beneficiary.
body:
